mapper.select: SELECT PR.PROC_NO, TO_CHAR(PR.PROC_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') AS PROC_DATE , CT.CT_NM, CC.CODE_NAME, E.EMP_NM, PR.PROC_MONEY_TYPE, PR.PROC_MONEY, PT.PT_SAVE, PT.PT_DD FROM PROCEDURE PR INNER JOIN CUSTOMER CT ON PR.CT_NO = CT.CT_NO INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON PR.PROC_SG_NO = CC.CODE_S_CATE AND PR.PROC_BG_NO = CC.CODE_M_CATE AND CC.CODE_L_CATE = 2 INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON PR.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO INNER JOIN POINT PT ON PR.PT_NO = PT.PT_NO
